Reviews.Title: I like this bag!
Reviews.Author: CP
Reviews.Content: I am not sure why other ratings are so low but this bag has worked very well for my Canon! Indeed I am still considered amateur level but either way so I don't have much equipment. But if size is the reason then simply a larger size is needed and should not bring this bag low ratings. I was able to fit the camera, standard lens, and a longer lens with the cords and other accessories.

Reviews.Title: SMALL
Reviews.Author: tisa
Reviews.Content: Doesn't fit all the items as shown in the pictures. The dividers take half the room in the bag!!! I only have a t3i with the 55 and 200 lens. Misleading. Buy Bigger. No time to return bc I'm going out of town with my new camera. Disappointed!

ProductInfo.Features:
Vangoddy Mythra Reinforced Camcorder / Camera Bag!!!
Fully customizable interior with removable dividers!!!
Padded lens/accessory sleeves and reinforced walls provide superior protection!!!
Side pockets allow fast access to memory cards, extra batteries, and other small items!!!
Convenient carrying with attached handles and removable shoulder strap!!!
ProductInfo.Name: Vangoddy Mythra Silver Medium Entry Level Canon DSLR & SLR Camera Bag For: Canon EOS Rebel T3, T3i, 12.2 MP, 18 MP, Canon EOS Rebel T2i 18 MP CMOS APS-C, Canon EOS Rebel T1i 15.1 MP CMOS, Canon EOS 60D CMOS, Canon EOS 7D CMOS, Canon EOS 5D Mark II (Mark 2) Full Frame CMOS, Canon Rebel XS, Body Only, Or with Lens (Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens, Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens, Canon EF 85mm f1.2L II USM Lens, 18-55mm Standard Lens, EF-S 18-135mm IS UD Standard Zoom Lens)
